content.description:
Protected by the First Amendment
 Not Protected by the First Amendment

A
 Libel/slander
 Fighting words

B
 Freedom of religion
 Freedom of assembly

C
 The right to burn a flag
 Obscenity

D
 Online newspapers
 The right of a student to pray in school
content.question: Which of the following is an accurate comparison of rights protected and not protected by the First Amendment?

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
